description: Types of things. All things of the same type have a similar set of characteristics.
name: Types

createdBy.description: The user who created an object.
createdBy.name: Created by

createdOn.description: The date and time when an object was created.
createdOn.name: Created on

owner.description: The user who owns an object.
owner.name: Owner

readableBy.description: Users and groups who are allowed to read (view) the values of an object's properties.
readableBy.name: Readable by
readableBy.shortDescription: Users and groups of users who can see an object's properties.

shortDescription.description: Text that describes an object in less than 80 characters.
shortDescription.name: Short description
shortDescription.shortDescription: Text that briefly describes an object.

tags.description: Key words or phrases that describe an object.
tags.name: Tags
tags.shortDescription: Key words or short phrases that describe an object.
